admin.schedulerDescription: Manage automated payment transfers to organizers
admin.schedulerProcessSteps: The scheduler runs daily at 2:00 AM (Swiss time)
It finds all paid tickets for completed events
Transfers 90% of ticket revenue to organizers (after 10% platform fee)
Updates ticket transfer status to 'completed' or 'failed'
Logs all transfer results for monitoring
admin.schedulerRequirementSteps: Event must be completed (end date passed)
Ticket must be paid and not already transferred
Organizer must have a connected Stripe account
Platform must have sufficient funds for transfers

about.hero.title: About Zafo
about.hero.description: Zafo is your ultimate platform for discovering and joining exciting events in your area. We connect people with experiences that match their interests and passions.
about.mission.title: Our Mission & Values
about.mission.subtitle: Our Mission
about.mission.paragraph1: At Zafo, we believe that meaningful experiences bring people together. Our mission is to make it easy for anyone to discover, create, and participate in events that spark joy, foster community, and create lasting memories.
about.mission.paragraph2: We're dedicated to building a platform that connects people with experiences that match their interests and passions, while empowering event organizers to reach their ideal audience.
about.mission.value1.title: Community First
about.mission.value1.description: We believe in the power of community. Every feature we build is designed to strengthen connections and make events more accessible to everyone.
about.mission.value2.title: Meaningful Experiences
about.mission.value2.description: We focus on quality over quantity, highlighting events that create genuine connections and memorable experiences for participants.
about.mission.value3.title: Accessibility
about.mission.value3.description: We're committed to making events accessible to everyone, regardless of background or ability, with features that support diverse needs.
about.mission.value4.title: Innovation
about.mission.value4.description: We continuously improve our platform with innovative features that enhance the event experience for both organizers and participants.
about.history.title: Our Story
about.history.description2018: Zafo began as a simple idea between friends who were frustrated with the difficulty of finding local events that matched their interests. Emma Richards and Michael Chen set out to build a solution that would bridge the gap between event organizers and participants.
about.history.description2019: After months of development, we launched our beta platform in three test cities. The response was overwhelmingly positive, with both event organizers and attendees appreciating the intuitive design and community-focused approach.
about.history.description2020: When in-person events were no longer possible, we quickly adapted our platform to support virtual events. This pivot not only kept our business alive but also helped countless event organizers continue their work during challenging times.
about.history.description2021: With growing demand, we expanded our platform nationwide, introducing advanced features for event discovery and management. Our team grew from 5 to 25 passionate individuals dedicated to our mission.
about.history.descriptionToday: Today, Zafo connects millions of people with events they love and empowers thousands of organizers to create meaningful experiences. We're constantly innovating and expanding to better serve our community, with exciting new features and capabilities on the horizon.
about.team.title: Meet Our Team
about.team.description: Our diverse team of passionate individuals is dedicated to creating the best platform for discovering and organizing events.
about.team.emma.name: Emma Richards
about.team.emma.bio: Emma brings 15 years of experience in the events industry and a passion for connecting people through shared experiences.
about.team.michael.name: Michael Chen
about.team.michael.bio: With a background in tech startups, Michael leads our engineering team to build a seamless and innovative platform.
about.team.sophia.name: Sophia Rodriguez
about.team.sophia.bio: Sophia has helped numerous brands create meaningful connections with their audiences through strategic marketing.
about.team.david.name: David Kim
about.team.david.bio: David ensures our product meets the needs of both event organizers and attendees through thoughtful design and features.
about.team.olivia.name: Olivia Patel
about.team.olivia.bio: Olivia is passionate about building and nurturing the Zafo community, ensuring every user feels welcome and supported.
about.team.james.name: James Wilson
about.team.james.bio: James develops strategic relationships with event organizers, venues, and brands to expand our event offerings.
about.meta.title: About Zafo | Our Story, Mission & Team
about.meta.description: Learn about Zafo, our mission to connect people through events, our team, and the story of how we started.
about.values.title: Our Values & Principles
about.values.description: At Zafo, we are guided by a set of core values that define how we operate and make decisions. These principles shape our platform and our relationships with our community.
about.values.innovation.title: Innovation
about.values.innovation.description: We continuously push boundaries to create new and better ways for people to discover, organize, and participate in events that matter to them.
about.values.community.title: Community First
about.values.community.description: We believe in the power of community and build features that strengthen connections, foster inclusivity, and make events more accessible to everyone.
about.values.accessibility.title: Accessibility
about.values.accessibility.description: We're committed to making events accessible regardless of background or ability, with features that support diverse needs and preferences.
about.values.experience.title: Quality Experiences
about.values.experience.description: We prioritize quality over quantity, highlighting events that create genuine connections and memorable experiences for all participants.
about.values.commitment.title: Our Commitment
about.values.commitment.description1: Our commitment to these values extends beyond our platform. We actively partner with organizations that share our vision and work to make the event industry more inclusive, sustainable, and impactful.
about.values.commitment.description2: We continuously strive to improve and evolve, guided by feedback from our community and the changing needs of event organizers and participants around the world.
impact.meta.title: Our Impact | Zafo
impact.meta.description: Discover how Zafo is making a positive difference in communities around the world through our initiatives and programs.
impact.hero.title: Our Impact
impact.hero.description: At Zafo, we believe in the power of events to create positive change. Discover how we're making a difference in communities around the world.
impact.hero.imageAlt: People collaborating at a community event
impact.initiatives.title: Our Initiatives
impact.initiatives.community.title: Community Event Access Program
impact.initiatives.community.description: We believe everyone should have access to enriching events, regardless of financial means. Our Community Event Access Program partners with organizers to provide free or reduced-price tickets to individuals who might otherwise be unable to attend.
impact.initiatives.community.imageAlt: Diverse group at a community event
impact.initiatives.green.title: Green Events Initiative
impact.initiatives.green.description: Our Green Events Initiative helps event organizers reduce their environmental footprint. From paperless ticketing to carbon offset programs, we're committed to making events more sustainable for our planet.
impact.initiatives.green.stats.0.label: Reduction in paper waste
impact.initiatives.green.stats.1.label: Tons of CO₂ offset
impact.initiatives.green.stats.2.label: Certified green events
impact.initiatives.diversity.title: Diversity in Events Fund
impact.initiatives.diversity.description: The Diversity in Events Fund supports underrepresented event organizers to create inclusive and diverse events. Through grants, mentorship, and resources, we're helping to ensure that events reflect the full diversity of our communities.
impact.stories.title: Impact Stories
impact.stories.maria.name: Maria Rodriguez
impact.stories.maria.testimonial: Thanks to Zafo's Community Event Access Program, we've been able to bring over 500 underprivileged youth to cultural events they would never have experienced otherwise. The impact on their confidence and aspirations has been incredible to witness.
impact.stories.david.name: David Chen
impact.stories.david.testimonial: The resources and support from Zafo's Green Events Initiative helped us reduce our annual conference's carbon footprint by 75%. We're proud to show that large-scale events can be both impactful and environmentally responsible.
impact.stories.aisha.name: Aisha Johnson
impact.stories.aisha.testimonial: As a first-time event organizer from an underrepresented background, the mentorship and funding I received through Zafo's Diversity in Events Fund was invaluable. We've now hosted three successful summits that have created countless opportunities for diverse tech talent.
impact.goals.title: Our Goals for the Future
impact.goals.description: At Zafo, we're committed to making a positive impact through events. Here are the ambitious goals we're working towards achieving by 2025:
impact.goals.learnMore: Learn more about our company values
impact.goals.environmental.title: Environmental Impact
impact.goals.environmental.goals.0: Achieve carbon neutrality for 100% of events hosted on our platform
impact.goals.environmental.goals.1: Eliminate single-use plastics at 75% of in-person events
impact.goals.environmental.goals.2: Plant one million trees through our events offset program
impact.goals.accessibility.title: Access & Inclusion
impact.goals.accessibility.goals.0: Provide 50,000 free tickets annually to underserved communities
impact.goals.accessibility.goals.1: Ensure 100% of events on our platform meet accessibility standards
impact.goals.accessibility.goals.2: Expand our platform to 25 additional countries, focusing on developing regions
impact.goals.community.title: Community Impact
impact.goals.community.goals.0: Facilitate $5 million in donations to local charities through events
impact.goals.community.goals.1: Support 1,000 new small business event organizers annually
impact.goals.community.goals.2: Create 500,000 volunteer hours through events on our platform
impact.goals.education.title: Education & Knowledge
impact.goals.education.goals.0: Provide free event management training to 10,000 people from underrepresented groups
impact.goals.education.goals.1: Develop comprehensive event management certification courses in 10 languages
impact.goals.education.goals.2: Create an open-source library of best practices for inclusive and sustainable events
investors.hero.title: Investor Relations
investors.hero.description: Zafo is revolutionizing the events industry with a platform that connects people with experiences that match their passions. Join us in our mission to transform how the world discovers and participates in events.
investors.financials.title: Financial Highlights
investors.financials.description: Zafo has demonstrated strong, consistent growth since our founding. Our focus on user experience and unique event discovery has driven record revenue and user adoption.
investors.strategy.title: Our Growth Strategy
investors.strategy.description: We are focused on sustainable growth through strategic initiatives that expand our platform reach while maintaining our commitment to quality experiences and community values.
investors.strategy.expansion.title: Global Expansion
investors.strategy.expansion.description: We're expanding our footprint to new markets across Europe, Asia, and South America, bringing our platform to event creators and attendees worldwide.
investors.strategy.innovation.title: Product Innovation
investors.strategy.innovation.descriptio: Our dedicated R&D team is developing next-generation features including AI-powered event recommendations and augmented reality experiences.
investors.strategy.partnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
investors.strategy.partnerships.descript: We're building alliances with key players in the entertainment, hospitality, and transportation sectors to enhance the end-to-end event experience.
investors.strategy.sustainability.title: Sustainable Business Model
investors.strategy.sustainability.descri: We're diversifying our revenue streams through premium features, value-added services, and data insights for enterprise customers.
investors.contact.title: Investor Information
investors.contact.description: Get the information you need to make informed investment decisions about Zafo.
investors.contact.meetings.title: Investor Meetings
investors.contact.meetings.description: Schedule a meeting with our investor relations team to discuss investment opportunities.
investors.contact.reports.title: Financial Reports
investors.contact.reports.description: Access our latest financial reports, presentations, and SEC filings.
investors.contact.newsletter.title: Investor Newsletter
investors.contact.newsletter.description: Stay updated with quarterly performance reports and important announcements.
investors.contact.inquiries.title: Investor Inquiries
investors.contact.inquiries.description: Have questions about investing in Zafo? Contact our investor relations team for more information.
accessibility.meta.title: Accessibility | Zafo
accessibility.meta.description: Learn about Zafo's commitment to accessibility and how we make events accessible to everyone, regardless of ability.
accessibility.hero.title: Accessibility at Zafo
accessibility.hero.description: We believe that events should be accessible to everyone. Learn about our approach to accessibility and the features we've built to make that possible.
accessibility.hero.imageAlt: Person using adaptive technology to access an event platform
accessibility.intro.paragraph: Our platform is built with accessibility at its core, ensuring that everyone can discover, create, and participate in events regardless of their abilities or needs. We follow WCAG 2.1 guidelines and continuously work to improve the user experience for all.
accessibility.features.title: Accessibility Features
accessibility.features.keyboard.title: Keyboard Navigation
accessibility.features.keyboard.descript: Full keyboard navigation support for all platform functions, ensuring users can navigate without a mouse.
accessibility.features.screenReaders.des: Compatible with all major screen readers including JAWS, NVDA, and VoiceOver for comprehensive audio navigation.
accessibility.features.altText.title: Alternative Text
accessibility.features.altText.descripti: All images include descriptive alternative text to provide context for users with visual impairments.
accessibility.features.contrast.title: High Contrast Mode
accessibility.features.contrast.descript: High contrast color schemes and customizable text sizing for better readability and visual comfort.
accessibility.features.text.title: Text Scaling
accessibility.features.text.description: Text can be scaled up to 200% without loss of functionality, supporting users with low vision.
accessibility.features.navigation.title: Clear Navigation
accessibility.features.navigation.descri: Consistent navigation structure with clear headings and landmarks for easy orientation.
accessibility.features.forms.title: Form Accessibility
accessibility.features.forms.description: All forms include proper labels, error messages, and validation feedback for assistive technologies.
accessibility.features.patterns.title: Error Prevention
accessibility.features.patterns.descript: Clear error messages and confirmation dialogs to prevent mistakes and provide helpful guidance.
accessibility.eventInfo.title: Event Accessibility Information
accessibility.eventInfo.description: We encourage event organizers to provide detailed accessibility information for their events, helping participants make informed decisions about attendance.
accessibility.eventInfo.commitment.title: Our Commitment to Event Accessibility
accessibility.eventInfo.commitment.descr: We provide tools and guidance for organizers to make their events accessible, including templates for accessibility information and best practices for inclusive event planning.
accessibility.eventInfo.overlay.title: Accessible Event Planning
accessibility.eventInfo.overlay.descript: Learn how to create events that welcome everyone, regardless of ability or need.
accessibility.eventInfo.imageAlt: Diverse group of people at an accessible event venue
accessibility.eventInfo.wheelchair: Wheelchair accessible venues and seating arrangements
accessibility.eventInfo.interpretation: Sign language interpretation and captioning services
accessibility.eventInfo.listening: Assistive listening devices and audio amplification
accessibility.eventInfo.venue: Detailed venue accessibility information and photos
accessibility.improvements.title: Continuous Improvement
accessibility.improvements.description: We are committed to continuously improving our platform's accessibility. Our team regularly conducts audits, testing, and training to ensure we meet and exceed accessibility standards.
accessibility.improvements.audits.title: Regular Accessibility Audits
accessibility.improvements.audits.descri: We conduct comprehensive accessibility audits using automated tools and manual testing to identify and fix accessibility issues.
accessibility.improvements.testing.title: User Testing
accessibility.improvements.testing.descr: We work with users who have disabilities to test our platform and provide feedback on accessibility features and improvements.
accessibility.improvements.training.desc: Our development team receives regular training on accessibility best practices and WCAG guidelines to ensure all new features are accessible.
accessibility.improvements.standards.des: We maintain compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA standards and stay updated with the latest accessibility guidelines and regulations.
accessibility.feedback.title: We Value Your Feedback
accessibility.feedback.description: Your feedback helps us improve our platform's accessibility. If you encounter any accessibility issues or have suggestions for improvements, we want to hear from you.
notFound.title: Oops! Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for seems to have wandered off. Don't worry, let's get you back on track!
contact.meta.title: Contact Zafo | Get in Touch With Our Team
contact.meta.description: Have questions or feedback? Contact our team via email, phone, or visit our headquarters. We're here to help with all your event-related inquiries.
contact.hero.title: Contact Us
contact.hero.description: Have questions, suggestions, or need assistance? We're here to help. Get in touch with our team and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

legal.title: Legal Information
legal.metaDescription: Legal information, terms of service, privacy policy, and other legal documents for the Zafo platform.
legal.description: Access all legal documents, compliance information, and policies for Zafo's services.
legal.introduction: At Zafo, we are committed to transparency and protecting your rights. Below you will find all our legal documents that govern your use of our platform and services.
legal.documents.terms.title: Terms of Service
legal.documents.terms.description: The terms and conditions that govern your use of Zafo's services and platform.
legal.documents.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.documents.privacy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
legal.documents.cookies.title: Cookie Policy
legal.documents.cookies.description: Information about the cookies and similar technologies we use on our website.
legal.documents.gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
legal.documents.gdpr.description: Details about how we comply with the EU General Data Protection Regulation.
legal.documents.accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
legal.documents.accessibility.descriptio: Our commitment to making Zafo accessible to all users, including those with disabilities.
legal.documents.copyright.title: Copyright Notice
legal.documents.copyright.description: Information about copyright protection of Zafo's content and how you may use it.
legal.faqs.dataCollection.question: What data does Zafo collect about me?
legal.faqs.dataCollection.answer:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, use interactive features, make a purchase, request customer support, or otherwise communicate with us. This may include your name, email, password, profile photo, and billing information.

We also automatically collect certain information when you use our services, including log information, device information, location information, and usage information. For full details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
legal.faqs.dataRights.question: What rights do I have regarding my personal data?
legal.faqs.dataRights.answer:
Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, including:

• The right to access your personal data
• The right to correct inaccurate data
• The right to request deletion of your data
• The right to restrict processing of your data
• The right to data portability
• The right to object to our processing of your data

To exercise these rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at dpo@zafo.com.
legal.faqs.cookiePolicy.question: How does Zafo use cookies?
legal.faqs.cookiePolicy.answer:
We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, provide our services, and understand how people use our platform. Cookies help us remember your preferences, understand how you interact with our services, and tailor advertising.

We use both session cookies (which expire once you close your browser) and persistent cookies (which stay on your device until deleted). You can control cookies through your browser settings and other tools.
legal.faqs.gdprCompliance.question: How does Zafo comply with GDPR?
legal.faqs.gdprCompliance.answer:
We comply with GDPR by maintaining transparent data practices, obtaining appropriate consent for data processing, implementing strong data security measures, respecting data subject rights, carefully managing our data processors, maintaining records of processing activities, conducting Data Protection Impact Assessments where necessary, and having a designated Data Protection Officer.

Our GDPR compliance is an ongoing process that is regularly reviewed and updated.
legal.faqs.accountDeletion.question: How can I delete my account and all my data?
legal.faqs.accountDeletion.answer:
You can request account deletion by going to your Account Settings page and selecting the 'Delete Account' option. Alternatively, you can contact our support team at support@zafo.com.

Upon deletion, we will remove your personal information from our active databases. Note that some information may be retained in our backup systems for a limited period, and we may retain certain information if necessary for legitimate business purposes or to comply with legal obligations.
legal.compliance.description: At Zafo, we take our legal obligations seriously and are committed to complying with relevant laws and regulations across the jurisdictions where we operate. Our team regularly reviews and updates our practices to ensure ongoing compliance.
legal.contact.title: Legal Inquiries
legal.contact.description: Have specific legal questions or concerns? Our legal department is here to help. Please direct your inquiries to the appropriate contact below.
legal.contact.dataProtection.title: Data Protection Officer
legal.contact.dataProtection.description: For inquiries related to personal data, privacy, or data subject rights:
legal.contact.legalDepartment.title: Legal Department
legal.contact.legalDepartment.descriptio: For general legal inquiries, copyright claims, or legal notices:

legal.additionalInfo.company.title: Company Information
legal.additionalInfo.company.description: Zafo, Inc. is a company registered in Delaware, USA (Registration Number: 123456789). We operate globally and comply with applicable laws in each jurisdiction where our services are available.
legal.additionalInfo.contact.title: Contact for Legal Notices
legal.additionalInfo.contact.description: All legal notices should be sent in writing to our registered address or via email to legal@zafo.com. For general inquiries, please use our contact form.
legal.additionalInfo.updates.title: Updates to Legal Documents
legal.additionalInfo.updates.description: We may update our legal documents from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by posting a notice on our website or sending you an email. Your continued use of our services after such notifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms.
plans.meta.title: Pricing Plans | Zafo
plans.meta.description: Choose the perfect Zafo plan for your event needs. From free accounts to professional organizer plans, find the right option for you.
plans.hero.title: Pricing Plans
plans.hero.description: Choose the perfect plan for your event needs. Whether you're a casual participant or a professional organizer, we have options to suit your requirements.
plans.pricing.free.name: Free
plans.pricing.free.description: For individuals who want to explore events
plans.pricing.pro.name: Pro
plans.pricing.organizer.name: Organizer
plans.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
plans.faq.q1: How do I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
plans.faq.a1: You can change your plan at any time by going to your account settings and selecting "Subscription". From there, you can choose to upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan. Changes to your subscription will take effect at the beginning of your next billing cycle.
plans.faq.q2: Is there a contract or commitment?
plans.faq.a2: No. All of our plans are month-to-month or annual subscriptions with no long-term contracts. You can cancel at any time and your subscription will end at the conclusion of your current billing cycle.
plans.faq.q3: Can I switch between monthly and annual billing?
plans.faq.a3: Yes, you can switch between monthly and annual billing at any time. If you switch from monthly to annual, you'll be charged the annual rate immediately. If you switch from annual to monthly, the change will take effect after your current annual subscription ends.
plans.faq.q4: Do you offer a free trial?
plans.faq.a4: We offer a 14-day free trial of our Pro plan for new users. No credit card is required to start your trial. At the end of your trial period, you can choose to subscribe to one of our paid plans or continue with the Free plan.
plans.faq.q5: What payment methods do you accept?
plans.faq.a5: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), as well as PayPal. For annual subscriptions, we can also accommodate bank transfers or checks for business accounts.
plans.faq.a6: Yes. We use industry-standard encryption and never store your full credit card details on our servers. All payments are processed through secure, PCI-compliant payment providers.
plans.faq.q7: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
plans.faq.a7: If you cancel your subscription, you'll still have access to your current plan features until the end of your billing period. After that, your account will automatically downgrade to the Free plan.
plans.faq.a8: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for annual subscriptions. Monthly subscriptions are not eligible for refunds. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, please contact our support team within 30 days of your payment.

faq.metaDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about Zafo's platform, events, account management, privacy, and more.
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Browse through our comprehensive FAQ section to find answers to the most commonly asked questions about Zafo, our platform, and our services.
faq.search.noResults: No questions found matching your search. Try different keywords or browse through our categories.
faq.general.whatIs.question: What is Zafo?
faq.general.whatIs.answer: Zafo is a comprehensive event discovery and management platform that connects people with experiences that match their interests. Our platform allows users to browse and join exciting events in their area, while also empowering organizers to create and manage their own events efficiently. We offer tools for event registration, ticketing, and community building, all designed to make the event experience seamless from start to finish.
faq.general.howItWorks.question: How does Zafo work?
faq.general.howItWorks.answer: Zafo works by connecting event organizers with potential attendees. Organizers can create and list events on our platform, while attendees can discover events based on location, interests, date, or category. Users can create profiles to get personalized event recommendations, save favorite events, and track their event history. Our platform handles registration, ticketing, reminders, and provides tools for organizers to manage attendees and gather feedback after events.
faq.general.getStarted.question: How do I get started with Zafo?
faq.general.getStarted.answer: Getting started with Zafo is easy! First, create a free account by clicking the 'Register' button in the top right corner of our website. Fill in your details and preferences to help us customize your event recommendations. Once registered, you can immediately start browsing events based on your location and interests. To create your own event, upgrade to an Organizer account from your profile settings. Our tutorial videos and help center provide comprehensive guides for both attendees and organizers.
faq.general.differenceCompetitors.questi: How is Zafo different from other event platforms?
faq.general.differenceCompetitors.answer: Zafo differentiates itself through our community-centered approach, sophisticated recommendation engine, and comprehensive tools for both attendees and organizers. Unlike many platforms that focus solely on ticketing or listing, we provide an end-to-end experience with features like personalized recommendations, seamless registration processes, advanced organizer analytics, and built-in community engagement tools. Our platform is designed to create meaningful connections between people with similar interests through carefully curated events.
faq.general.mobileFriendly.question: Is Zafo mobile-friendly?
faq.general.mobileFriendly.answer: Absolutely! Zafo is fully optimized for mobile devices. You can access all features of our platform through any modern mobile browser, with the interface automatically adapting to your screen size. We also offer dedicated mobile apps for iOS and Android devices, providing enhanced features like push notifications for event reminders, offline access to tickets, and location-based event discovery. Whether you're an attendee or organizer, you can manage your Zafo experience seamlessly on the go.
faq.account.createAccount.question: How do I create a Zafo account?
faq.account.createAccount.answer: Creating a Zafo account is simple. Click the 'Register' or 'Sign Up' button at the top of our homepage. You can sign up using your email address, or use the convenient social login options (Google, Facebook, or Apple). Complete your profile by adding your name, location, and interests to help us personalize your event recommendations. Verification of your email address is required to fully activate your account and receive event notifications. The entire process takes less than two minutes.
faq.account.changePassword.question: How do I change my password?
faq.account.changePassword.answer: To change your password, log into your Zafo account and navigate to your profile settings by clicking on your profile picture in the top right corner and selecting 'Settings'. In the Account Security section, click on 'Change Password'. You'll need to enter your current password for verification, then create and confirm your new password. We recommend using a strong password with a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters. After saving, you'll receive a confirmation email that your password has been changed.
faq.account.deleteAccount.question: How can I delete my account?
faq.account.deleteAccount.answer: To delete your Zafo account, go to your profile settings by clicking your profile picture in the top right corner and selecting 'Settings'. Scroll to the bottom of the page to find the 'Delete Account' section and click on 'Delete My Account'. You'll be asked to confirm your decision and enter your password for security purposes. Please note that account deletion is permanent and removes all your data, including event history, saved events, and personal information. If you have any active event registrations or are organizing events, please address these before deleting your account.
faq.account.editProfile.question: How do I edit my profile information?
faq.account.editProfile.answer: To edit your profile, click on your profile picture in the top right corner and select 'Profile' from the dropdown menu. Click the 'Edit Profile' button to modify your personal information. You can update your name, profile picture, bio, location, contact information, and notification preferences. You can also adjust your interests to improve event recommendations. Remember to click 'Save Changes' after making your edits. Your updated profile will be immediately visible to other Zafo users if you have a public profile.
faq.account.notifications.question: How do I manage my notification settings?
faq.account.notifications.answer: To manage notifications, go to your profile settings by clicking on your profile picture and selecting 'Settings'. Navigate to the 'Notifications' tab where you can customize your preferences for email notifications, push notifications (for mobile app users), and SMS alerts. You can choose which types of notifications you want to receive, such as event reminders, updates to events you're attending, new event recommendations, or platform announcements. You can also set the frequency of notifications and quiet hours during which you won't receive alerts.
faq.billing.pricing.question: How much does Zafo cost?
faq.billing.pricing.answer: Zafo offers several pricing tiers to suit different needs. The Basic account is free and allows you to browse events, create a profile, and register for events. Our Pro account ($5.99/month) provides additional features like early access to popular events, exclusive discounts, and an ad-free experience. The Organizer account ($19.99/month) includes all Pro features plus comprehensive event creation and management tools, analytics, and ticketing functionality. Enterprise solutions are also available for large organizations with custom pricing. All paid plans offer monthly or annual billing options, with annual subscriptions providing a 15% discount.
faq.billing.paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.billing.paymentMethods.answer: Zafo accepts a wide range of payment methods for both subscription payments and event ticket purchases. We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. For annual subscriptions, we also accept bank transfers. All payment processing is handled securely using industry-standard encryption, and we never store your complete card details on our servers. If you have any issues with payment processing, our customer support team is available to assist you.
faq.billing.refunds.question: What is your refund policy?
faq.billing.refunds.answer: Our refund policy varies depending on whether you're requesting a refund for a subscription or an event ticket. For Zafo subscriptions, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on annual plans, while monthly plans can be canceled anytime but are not eligible for partial refunds. For event tickets, refund policies are set by the event organizers and vary by event. These policies are clearly displayed on the event page before purchase. If an event is canceled by the organizer, attendees automatically receive full refunds. For any issues with refunds, please contact our support team.
faq.billing.cancelSubscription.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.billing.cancelSubscription.answer: To cancel your subscription, go to your account settings by clicking on your profile picture and selecting 'Settings'. Navigate to the 'Subscription' tab and click on 'Cancel Subscription'. You'll be asked to confirm your cancellation and provide feedback about your experience. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period, after which your account will revert to the free Basic plan. You'll retain access to all your data, including event history and saved events. If you change your mind, you can reactivate your subscription at any time before the end of the billing period.
faq.billing.upgradeAccount.question: How do I upgrade my account?
faq.billing.upgradeAccount.answer: Upgrading your Zafo account is simple. From your dashboard, click on your profile picture and select 'Settings'. Navigate to the 'Subscription' tab where you'll see the available plan options. Choose the plan that best suits your needs and click 'Upgrade'. You'll be guided through our secure payment process to complete the upgrade. If you're upgrading from a free to a paid plan, your new features will be available immediately after payment. If you're upgrading between paid plans, you'll typically receive a prorated credit for your current subscription. For any questions about upgrading, our support team is ready to assist.
faq.privacy.dataUse.question: How does Zafo use my data?
faq.privacy.dataUse.answer: Zafo uses your data primarily to provide and improve our services. This includes personalizing your event recommendations, processing registrations and payments, sending notifications, and enhancing platform functionality. We analyze usage patterns to improve user experience and may use anonymized data for research purposes. Your profile information helps event organizers manage attendees and may be visible to other users based on your privacy settings. We also use data for security purposes and to comply with legal obligations. For complete details about our data practices, please review our comprehensive Privacy Policy.
faq.privacy.dataShare.question: Does Zafo share my information with third parties?
faq.privacy.dataShare.answer: Zafo shares your information with third parties only in specific circumstances. We share necessary attendance information with event organizers for events you register for. We use trusted service providers for essential functions like payment processing, email delivery, and analytics, all under strict confidentiality agreements. If required by law, we may share information in response to legal processes. We never sell your personal data to advertisers or other third parties. When you register for an event, you may opt-in to share your information with the organizer for marketing purposes, but this is always optional. Our Privacy Policy provides full details about our information-sharing practices.
faq.privacy.yourRights.question: What are my rights regarding my personal data?
faq.privacy.yourRights.answer: As a Zafo user, you have several important rights regarding your personal data. These include the right to access all data we hold about you, correct inaccurate data, request deletion of your data (subject to certain exceptions), object to specific data uses, and obtain a portable copy of your data. You can also withdraw consent for optional data processing at any time. To exercise these rights, visit the Privacy section in your account settings or contact our Data Protection Officer. Users in certain jurisdictions (such as EU residents under GDPR or California residents under CCPA) may have additional rights, which we fully respect and comply with.
faq.privacy.accountSecurity.question: How does Zafo keep my account secure?
faq.privacy.accountSecurity.answer: Zafo employs multiple layers of security to protect your account. We use industry-standard encryption for all data transmission (SSL/TLS) and secure password hashing. We offer two-factor authentication to add an extra layer of security to your login process. Our systems are regularly updated and monitored for suspicious activities, with automatic alerts for unusual login attempts or activities. We conduct regular security audits and penetration testing by independent security experts. We also provide users with tools to monitor their account activity and receive notifications about new logins. For optimal security, we recommend using a strong, unique password and enabling two-factor authentication.
faq.events.createEvent.question: How do I create an event on Zafo?
faq.events.createEvent.answer: To create an event on Zafo, you need an Organizer account. From your dashboard, click the 'Create Event' button. Our intuitive event creator will guide you through the process: enter basic details (title, date, time, location), add a description and images, set up ticketing options, and configure additional settings like capacity limits and registration deadlines. You can save your event as a draft or publish it immediately. Once published, your event will be visible to Zafo users based on your targeting options. Our organizer tools also allow you to track registrations, communicate with attendees, and gather post-event feedback.
faq.events.editEvent.question: Can I edit my event after publishing it?
faq.events.editEvent.answer: Yes, you can edit most event details after publishing. From your organizer dashboard, select the event and click 'Edit Event'. You can update the description, images, date (if no tickets have been sold), add new ticket types, and modify most other details. However, certain changes like decreasing the event capacity below the number of sold tickets or substantially changing the event's nature may require special handling. If you make significant changes, we recommend notifying registered attendees through the built-in messaging system. All edits are tracked in the event history for transparency.
faq.events.cancelEvent.question: How do I cancel an event?
faq.events.cancelEvent.answer: To cancel an event, go to your organizer dashboard, select the event, and click 'Cancel Event' from the event actions menu. You'll be asked to provide a reason for cancellation, which will be shared with registered attendees. You'll have options for handling refunds – automatic refunds to all attendees, offering credit for future events, or custom arrangements. Once confirmed, all registered attendees will be automatically notified of the cancellation via email and app notifications. The event will be marked as 'Canceled' on the platform, and tickets will no longer be available for purchase.
faq.technical.browserSupport.question: Which browsers does Zafo support?
faq.technical.browserSupport.answer: Zafo supports all modern web browsers including Google Chrome (version 83+), Mozilla Firefox (version 76+), Apple Safari (version 13+), Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based version 83+), and Opera (version 69+). For the best experience, we recommend keeping your browser updated to the latest version. Internet Explorer is not supported. Our platform is responsive and works on desktop, tablet, and mobile browsers. If you encounter any issues with your browser, please ensure it's updated, clear your cache and cookies, or try an alternative supported browser.
faq.technical.appRequirements.question: What are the requirements for using the Zafo mobile app?
faq.technical.appRequirements.answer: The Zafo mobile app requires iOS 13 or later for Apple devices and Android 8.0 (Oreo) or later for Android devices. The app needs approximately 100MB of free storage space for installation. For optimal performance, we recommend at least 1GB of RAM. The app requires an internet connection (Wi-Fi or mobile data) for most functions, though some features like accessing tickets are available offline after initial loading. Location services, camera access, and push notifications are optional but enhance the app experience. The app is regularly updated, so enabling automatic updates is recommended.
faq.technical.troubleshooting.question: I'm experiencing technical issues. What should I do?
faq.technical.troubleshooting.answer: If you're experiencing technical issues with Zafo, try these troubleshooting steps: 1) Refresh the page or restart the app, 2) Clear your browser cache and cookies, 3) Ensure you're using a supported browser or app version, 4) Check your internet connection, 5) Disable browser extensions that might interfere with functionality. If problems persist, visit our Help Center for common issue solutions or contact our support team with details about the issue, including the device, browser/app version, and steps to reproduce the problem. Our technical support team is available 24/7 and typically responds within 24 hours.
faq.stillHaveQuestions.title: Still Have Questions?
faq.stillHaveQuestions.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help with any questions you might have about Zafo.

about.hero.visionDescription: To create a world where meaningful connections happen through shared experiences, making every event an opportunity for discovery and growth.
about.mission.achievement1: Connected over 50,000 people through meaningful events
about.mission.achievement2: Supported 10,000+ organizers in creating successful events
about.mission.achievement3: Expanded to 500+ cities across multiple countries
about.mission.quote: We believe every event has the power to change lives. Our platform is designed to make those connections possible, one event at a time.
about.mission.ctaDescription: Whether you're looking to discover amazing events or create them, we're here to support your journey. Let's build meaningful connections together.
about.values.principlesDescription: These fundamental principles guide every decision we make and every feature we develop, ensuring we stay true to our mission.
about.values.principle1.title: Trust & Security
about.values.principle1.description: We prioritize the security and privacy of our users, implementing robust measures to protect personal data and ensure safe transactions.
about.values.principle2.title: User-Centric Design
about.values.principle2.description: Every feature and decision is made with our users in mind, ensuring intuitive experiences that meet real needs and solve actual problems.
about.values.principle3.title: Quality Assurance
about.values.principle3.description: We maintain high standards in everything we do, from platform reliability to customer support, ensuring excellence in every interaction.
contact.hero.subtitle: We're Here to Help
contact.hero.paragraph1: Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions about our platform, event creation, or general inquiries. We believe in providing exceptional customer service to ensure your experience with Zafo is nothing short of amazing.
contact.hero.paragraph2: Whether you're an event organizer looking to create your next successful event, a participant seeking information about upcoming events, or someone with general questions about our platform, we're here to support you every step of the way.
contact.hero.ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who trust Zafo for their event needs. Let's create something amazing together!
contact.info.title: Get in Touch
contact.info.description: We're here to help you with any questions or support you need. Choose the best way to reach us below.
contact.info.additionalDescription1: Our support team is dedicated to providing you with the best possible experience. We understand that every question is important and every user matters.
contact.info.additionalDescription2: With years of experience in event management and customer service, our team is equipped to handle any inquiry, from simple questions to complex technical issues.
contact.info.responseTimeValue: We typically respond within 2 hours during business hours
contact.info.supportTeamValue: Our team has extensive experience in event management and platform support
contact.form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. We're here to help with any questions or concerns you may have.
contact.map.description: Come visit us at our headquarters in San Francisco. We'd love to meet you in person and discuss how we can help with your event needs.
contact.map.quickContactDescription: Need immediate assistance? Use our contact form for the fastest response time.
accessibility.hero.subtitle: Our Commitment to Inclusivity
accessibility.hero.paragraph1: We understand that accessibility is not just a feature—it's a fundamental right. That's why we've built our platform from the ground up with accessibility in mind, following WCAG 2.1 guidelines and best practices to ensure everyone can use our platform effectively.
accessibility.hero.paragraph2: From screen readers and keyboard navigation to high contrast modes and alternative text, we've implemented comprehensive accessibility features that make our platform usable by people with diverse abilities and needs.
accessibility.hero.commitment.title: Inclusive by Design
accessibility.hero.commitment.descriptio: Every feature we develop is tested for accessibility from day one. We work with accessibility experts and users with disabilities to ensure our platform meets the highest standards of inclusivity.
accessibility.hero.standards.title: WCAG 2.1 Standards
accessibility.hero.standards.description: Our platform adheres to WCAG 2.1 AA standards, ensuring compatibility with assistive technologies and providing an inclusive experience for all users.
accessibility.hero.ctaDescription: Join our community of inclusive event organizers and participants. Together, we're making the world more accessible, one event at a time.
privacy.hero.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content.intro: At Zafo, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our platform.
privacy.content.readCarefully: Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not access the site.
privacy.content.section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
privacy.content.section1.personalData.de: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on our platform, express interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, participate in activities on our platform, or otherwise contact us. The personal information we collect may include:
privacy.content.section1.automaticallyCo: When you visit our platform, we may automatically collect certain information about your device, including:
Time and date of your visit
We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our platform or when you access our platform by or through a mobile device.
privacy.content.section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
privacy.content.section2.description: We may use the information we collect from you for various purposes, including to:
privacy.content.section2.item3: Notify you about changes to our service
privacy.content.section2.item4: Allow you to participate in interactive features of our platform
privacy.content.section2.item6: Process transactions and send related information
privacy.content.section2.item9: Respond to your inquiries and solve any potential issues
privacy.content.section2.item10: Personalize your experience and deliver content relevant to your interests
privacy.content.section2.item11: Develop and improve our platform, products, and services
privacy.content.section2.item12: Protect our platform from misuse, fraud, or any other illegal activities
privacy.content.section3.title: 3. Disclosure of Your Information
privacy.content.section3.description: We may share your information in the following situations:
privacy.content.section3.serviceProvider: We may share your information with service providers to perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, hosting services, customer service, and marketing assistance.
privacy.content.section3.eventOrganizers: When you register for an event, we share your information with the event organizer to facilitate your participation in the event.
privacy.content.section3.businessTransfe: We may share or transfer your information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company.
privacy.content.section3.withConsent.des: We may disclose your personal information for any other purpose with your consent.
privacy.content.section3.legalRequiremen: We may disclose your information where we are legally required to do so in order to comply with applicable law, governmental requests, a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process.
privacy.content.section4.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
privacy.content.section4.description1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and hold certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.
privacy.content.section4.description2: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our platform.
privacy.content.section5.title: 5. Data Security
privacy.content.section5.description: We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect the security of any personal information we process. However, despite our safeguards and efforts to secure your information, no electronic transmission over the Internet or information storage technology can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.
privacy.content.section6.title: 6. Third-Party Websites
privacy.content.section6.description: Our platform may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.
privacy.content.section7.title: 7. Children's Privacy
privacy.content.section7.description: Our platform is not intended for individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 18. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us.
privacy.content.section8.title: 8. Your Privacy Rights
privacy.content.section8.description: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as:
privacy.content.section8.item1: The right to access the personal information we have about you
privacy.content.section8.item2: The right to request correction of your personal information
privacy.content.section8.item3: The right to request deletion of your personal information
privacy.content.section8.item4: The right to object to processing of your personal information
privacy.content.section8.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the contact information provided below.
privacy.content.section9.title: 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy
privacy.content.section9.description1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
privacy.content.section9.description2: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
privacy.content.section10.title: 10. Contact Us
privacy.content.section10.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
terms.hero.title: Terms of Service
terms.content.intro: Please read these Terms of Service ("Terms", "Terms of Service") carefully before using the Zafo website and platform (the "Service") operated by Zafo, Inc. ("us", "we", or "our").
terms.content.acceptance: Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use the Service.
terms.content.agreement: By accessing or using the Service you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.
terms.content.section1.title: 1. Account Terms
terms.content.section1.age: You must be at least 18 years old to use this Service.
terms.content.section1.security: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. Zafo cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage from your failure to comply with this security obligation.
terms.content.section1.responsibility: You are responsible for all Content posted and activity that occurs under your account (even when Content is posted by others who have accounts under your account).
terms.content.section1.illegal: You may not use the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose. You must not, in the use of the Service, violate any laws in your jurisdiction (including but not limited to copyright or trademark laws).
terms.content.section2.title: 2. Event Listings and Ticket Purchases
terms.content.section2.platform: Zafo is a platform that allows users to discover, create, promote and attend events. Event organizers are responsible for the accuracy of their event listings, including but not limited to date, time, location, description, and pricing.
terms.content.section2.purchases: When purchasing tickets to events through our Service, you agree to pay all applicable fees and taxes. All ticket sales are final and non-refundable, except in cases where an event is canceled by the organizer or as otherwise required by law.
terms.content.section2.responsibility: Zafo is not responsible for the content, safety, quality, or any other aspect of events listed on our platform. Attendance at events is at your own risk.
terms.content.section3.title: 3. Service Modifications
terms.content.section3.modifications: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.
terms.content.section3.continuation: By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, please stop using the Service.
terms.content.section4.title: 4. Privacy Policy
terms.content.section4.reference: Please refer to our Privacy Policy for information about how we collect, use, and disclose information about you.
terms.content.section5.title: 5. Content Policy
terms.content.section5.content: Our Service allows you to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, videos, or other material ("Content"). You are responsible for the Content that you post on or through the Service, including its legality, reliability, and appropriateness.
terms.content.section5.warranty: By posting Content on or through the Service, you represent and warrant that: (1) the Content is yours (you own it) or you have the right to use it and grant us the rights and license as provided in these Terms, and (2) the posting of your Content on or through the Service does not violate the privacy rights, publicity rights, copyrights, contract rights or any other rights of any person.
terms.content.section6.title: 6. Copyright Infringement
terms.content.section6.notification: If you believe that any Content on our Service infringes upon your copyright, please notify us by providing the following information: (1) a physical or electronic signature of the copyright owner; (2) identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed; (3) identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing; (4) information reasonably sufficient to permit us to contact you; (5) a statement that you have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner; and (6) a statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that you are authorized to act on behalf of the copyright owner.
terms.content.section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
terms.content.section7.liability: In no event shall Zafo, its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the Service; (ii) any conduct or content of any third party on the Service; (iii) any content obtained from the Service; and (iv) unauthorized access, use or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence) or any other legal theory, whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such damage.
terms.content.section8.title: 8. Governing Law
terms.content.section8.law: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms.content.section8.waiver: Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights. If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court, the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in effect.
terms.content.section9.title: 9. Contact Us
terms.content.section9.contact: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.
